pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
I think there's a typo in the 3D RB docstring:  There should be no "plot" in this line:

mpiexec -n 4 python3 plot_2d_series.py plot snapshots/*.h5

Otherwise I think everything is working well, so I'll approve this PR!
content.html:
I think there's a typo in the 3D RB docstring: There should be no "plot" in this line:

mpiexec -n 4 python3 plot_2d_series.py plot snapshots/*.h5

Otherwise I think everything is working well, so I'll approve this PR!
